subject: Re: the Database is not updated
body:
On 6/20/07, Aruna Goke  wrote:
snip
>   $sth->execute($x[2], $x[5], $x[4], $x[6]);
snip

I would also change this line to

 $sth->execute(@x[2,5,4,6]);

But that is just because I am lazy.
